website_summaries.verdict: It's not a smart TV and lacks bells and whistles, but it offers a good screen size and resolution for a very reasonable price.
pros: User-friendly and easy to set up
VGA, HDMI, component, composite, cable, antenna, and audio inputs
cons: There's no WiFi or internet, but you can still stream via USB or HDMI cable
Some reports of screen having dead pixels or no image over time

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful displays for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful displays for the price! We bought these for all the conference rooms at work, and I liked them so much, I bought one for my house too! Plenty of inputs, easy to use, great picture. They don't have built in "smarts" but I like that so I can add a device of my choosing that I know will work with my network, etc. Have paired these with Google Cromecasts (regular and Ultra) and it works just great! The USB port will even power the standard version, so there's no extra power needed!
customer_reviews.author: TeeJ

customer_reviews.title: great picture for the price, stand is weird
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the TV is great, definitely for the price it's fantastic. Slight light bleed in dark scenes on the sides, but nothing terrible. The stand is really finicky, takes a lot of precise adjusting to get it so the TV sits level. Also note that the native refresh rate is 60hz, the MEMC setting apparently makes it "120hz," similar to what Vizio does about their motion technology. They should advertise this TV at 60hz though, 120 is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: UserPersonGuy

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Line DON'T Buy!
customer_reviews.text: worked amazing for a year. but of course after the warranty expired a few months back the tv blew out. customer service was no help Amazon or Sceptre bottom line don't waste your time get a real name brand basically told me I was sol
customer_reviews.author: Mike Morris

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I should have got a tv like this from the beginning. The same great pic as expensive tvs and super thin. My friends and I can't believe how technology has grown and parts can fit in something so thin and still have great sound and picture. I am 37 so I still remember the huge boob tubes! Great product with an out of this world price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was good until the day it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Was good until the day it wasn't. Less than two years before it wouldn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the TV was cheap. But I needed something right away as i just moved back from Europe and it cost a fortune. Super easy to put on the feet and connect everything. The picture is amazing. It seems durable. We will see. And it is made in the good ole USA. I am happy I bought it. Maybe I will now consider the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Demetrios

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this TV
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this TV Nov 2015, it died yesterday so didn't even last 2 years. Powers on and has sound but does not have a picture anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyjs4

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous TV Fabulous Price
customer_reviews.text: Anyone complaining about the TV needs to remember the price. If you want everything perfect go buy a Sony or a B&O and complain all you want. I have have this tv brand for over 10 years, and nothing is wrong with it. If it broke after the first day and the company or Amazon refused to replace it, that would be something I might need to know. But for $227, for a 50 inch TV, seriously why are you complaining. 5 stars all day long if it lasts a year. I have had mine 3 years, no issue except the remote kinda sucks. So buy a universal remote and solve the problem. Get batteries. Stop crying!
customer_reviews.author: Accept The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Works great....for a limited time...
customer_reviews.text: This TV worked great....then fizzled out in 3 1/2 years! Gone are the days of high quality and long-lasting products! I have one microwave that has reliably worked for more than 30 years, two refrigerators that have worked for more than 50 years, have a stove that is going on 60 years, and have one small TV that worked until cable came along and made the TV obsolete, yet it still has power after 40 years! Yet these days, expensive TVs last less than 5 years. Today's products are CRAP and I'm sick of hunting for replacement products on just about every single new item every few years!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trace Edward Zaber

customer_reviews.title: Great price and smooth gaming quality.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping arrival scared me to death since the package was a bit worse for wear but it was well insulated and was perfect. I use this for PC gaming and it runs my setting on ultra very smoothly and great picture quality after I played with the settings a bit ( it arrived with power saver as the default picture presets). I'd pick up a sound bar if you're looking for sound the size of the TV...but I'm very pleased with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: TV has died 13 months later - but it was 'okay' til now
customer_reviews.text: Owned this tv since 2015 It worked okay, serving it's purpose (til now) Remote is terrible. You usually have to aim directly at the power light And it has trouble sending a signal around small objects on my coffee table Sound wasn't great - you could set it to 'music' to get clear voices - but otherwise bad Details seemed okay - but colors are not vibrant or rich compared to higher end displays Connections placement is rather silly - you have to bend your cords to fit them into the back ports Which is why they included a single hdmi extension I guess All in all, wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: A_Man_That_Uses_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Nicely valued product that does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like this simple HDTV that basically does the job. It is not a true 50 inch, however, it is close, and looks nice with our blu ray player. I am still comparing the quality to my last HDTV, which was a little better because it was a smart tv that could connect to the internet, but I can connect to the internet now using my blu ray player which is connected to my Amazon Prime account. NIcely valued product that does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Cnote

customer_reviews.title: Upset!
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for about a year and a half! Then the picture quit working and the extended warranty assurant is a joke probably a 2 week process to get it fixed. If that would have been explained I would have bought a different tv with a better warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid tv n what not
customer_reviews.text: Its just as good as the ones that cost $800. Everyone was complaining about the sound but it seems okay to me. I'm cheap and don't waste my money. If you're like me, this TV is for you.
customer_reviews.author: CollinF

customer_reviews.title: hooked them up and it sounds great. other than that
customer_reviews.text: as I read in an earlier review, the sound leaves a lot to be desired, I had an old set of computer speakers, hooked them up and it sounds great. other than that, I love it...revision...I don't love it anymore ...when I first got this tv I was really happy with it. ive had it just over 2 years...got up this morning had sound but no pic...dead screen, and to fix it would cost as much as buying a new one. a good little tv if u don't mind buying a new one every 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Definetly worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Look, Its a cheap tv, so dont expect greatness. BUT, for the money i did pay, Its a perfect TV. The only bad thing is the sound. its very tinny sounding. I bought a sound bar and it made the TV 1000 times better. No other complaints. Looks great on the wall mount at my mothers house
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: ... don’t write many reviews but this is probably the best purchase we have ever made
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write many reviews but this is probably the best purchase we have ever made. Beautiful picture and spectacular sound. Amazing tv for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the TV continuously for a year, and have had zero issues. The IR remote could handle being a little more poweful, but I use it with my Apple TV, so it stays on all the time with Apple's awesome screen savers. No loss in clarity or led strength. Great TV from a brand I had never tried before. Will look to them for future purchases as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phone Phreak

customer_reviews.title: Faulty display out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Broken display out of the box. After waiting more than a week for delivery, I set it up, turned it on and....only colored streaks on 15% of the screen, the other 85% totally black. Hoping for quick refund but am told I have to haul it to UPS first. Yeesh.
customer_reviews.author: Cooked

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: holding up great. i bought a 37" sceptre tv years ago, and it's still going strong, that's why i didn't hesitate to go with sceptre again. i'm very happy with this tv. the sound was different at first, but now i don't notice it, i can't even remember what was weird about it, just remember thinking, hm, sounds different.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have made. Kinda hard to get the stand set up, but other than that it is a beautiful TV. I can't say much about the speakers as I have mine plugged into a receiver, but everything else is great. Only thing I will say is I noticed 2 total dead pixels upon turning it on for the first time. I wasn't surprised really considering the price, but I can't tell unless I get super close.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Barlow

customer_reviews.title: I've never seen an electrical appliance die so easily.
customer_reviews.text: This unit died in place after 90 days in an air conditioned facility w/ clean power. I've never seen an electrical appliance die so easily.
customer_reviews.author: james drew

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was definitely nervous about buying this, but I've had it for a few months now and I love this tv! I use it with my Apple TV and a sound bar and have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Good tv for the price but came with a screw ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tv for the price but came with a screw broken off in one of the base mounting holes. Just decided to take the risk and set it up with that screw not secured, since I couldn't seem to get the broken screw out of the hole.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. It was fine for about 14 months
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. It was fine for about 14 months, then nothing but black screen. Parts cost more than a new set, avoid this piece of trash!
customer_reviews.author: R. U. Kidding

customer_reviews.title: TV Sucks.
customer_reviews.text: 4 months and it is toast. Don't buy it. Can't return it ether. Now I have to buy another. I think I will spend the extra cash and get a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: larry b.

customer_reviews.title: I have had TV less than 18 months. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had TV less than 18 months. I turned the TV off and heard a snap sound from within the TV, now the TV will not turn on anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had this tv just over a year and the screen went black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten several compliments about how great this TV looks for not being a big brand. It is great in every aspect. Even the speakers are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hay

customer_reviews.title: Went bad after 2 months use
customer_reviews.text: This TV arrived and worked great to start. Unfortunately, within 2 months of use it developed a line in the center of the screen (top to bottom) and over time this only grown to a 1.5" band of lines and distortion, right in the middle. This TV was not mishandled or put at risk, it came out of the box and went right on the wall. The lines are disappointing and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: WVITDEPT

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's great - at least so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a monitor for a Sunday School class and it does a great job. Some reviews have warned about failure but so far, they have worked great (I have 2).
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Stopped turning on after 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: Well it was a good TV while it lasted, so 2 stars instead of one. 2 years and 2 months after I purchased, with honestly not a whole lot of use in between, it stops turning on. So, probably avoid if you need one for longer than a few years, there are certainly better options available now. Might change review depending on what company does, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your on the fence just get it over with, Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Thought it to be a good budget set. Picture is great and sound is adequate for a bedroom but was surprised at the quality. For the price best bang for the buck really.
customer_reviews.author: JustBrutal

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Died after 3 years. **Update** I am seeing some feedback static flashes on the screen. I have all 3 of the hdmi cables plugged in and if all of the devices are on at the same time there is major feedback and it makes the screen not watchable. Cheap, good for a living room. You will definitely have to change the picture settings if you want a good picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice TV. I bought it for my daughter and it's so nice I'm thinking of buying one for myself. Very nice picture quality. And nice additional features too.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tv
customer_reviews.text: Excellent television for the price yes the sound is not great but every other aspect of this TV is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Joseph bissot

customer_reviews.title: For the price wow this TV rocks
customer_reviews.text: What can I say got it mounted it up set it up and wow beautiful picture and sound so good lots of it. Very clean picture all around good buy and good TV I'm loving on it
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional Picture quality for the price, and free shipping. you can't beat this with a stick. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leovardo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Picture dead after two years
customer_reviews.text: After two years the picture went out, you can still hear the sound.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Stopped working a year and a half after buying it.
customer_reviews.author: YourPersonalReviewGuru

customer_reviews.title: Inputs listed are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV because of the listed inputs, specifically VGA. Need it for a prompter. No VGA on it. Will have to return or spend more money on a converter.
customer_reviews.author: Chad C.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture. Sound is king of so so
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Sound is king of so so. Cant expect too much from a flat screen. I would buy it again if I need one in another room.
customer_reviews.author: Irby D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV, not so great audio.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price but the audio is terrible. You will definitely need to get speakers or a sound bar to enjoy it. WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, bad sound
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a decent TV for the price. Sound quality is crap, I tried playing around with the sound settings and it didn’t help much. Base is sturdy, tv is very lightweight and easy for me to move by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Well just after 2.5 years of buying this HDTV the backlight goes out, what a major disappointment. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great picture for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great picture for the money, but stock speakers could be better. I'm sure a sound bar would be an improvement. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: SUPER TV
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A REAL NICE TV AT A GREAT PRICE. I DIDNT WANT A SMART TV SO THIS IS JUST WHAT I NEEDED.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie L

customer_reviews.title: Downgraded rating due to failure of TV in less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Previously rated at 5 stars but after less than 2 years this TV died so I have revised my rating to 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shuler

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE BASIC 50" SCREEN GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV it is a good price for a 50" screen and has all the right features, including 3 slots for HDTV. It is lightweight so one person can pick it up. I was initially concerned that it was not a name brand that I knew, but the manufacture seems on par with Sony.
customer_reviews.author: JOX99

customer_reviews.title: ... bought the TV for my office and it works great for what we needed and for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the TV for my office and it works great for what we needed and for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool for the price
customer_reviews.text: TV works great but it needs a sound bar to amplify the sound. I also had a converter box to watch regular TV because I don't have cable.
customer_reviews.author: Latia H

customer_reviews.title: Want a nice tv at a good price? This may be it.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this tv for 3 days and so far I love it.Great price, picture, connections what more could you ask for?Well the reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of a few quirks I ve found. First the source selector, it disappears to guickly.If you dont find your source guickly the guide dissappears.It can be frustrating, and when you do get to select your input it may take 2 to 3 presses to select what you want. Thats it , I will put up with these minor quirks for what I paid as long as nothing else happens a4 will remain my rating.See me in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: E.O.

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality TV. My one complaint would be the audio quality could be a little better
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: So far, have not had any problems with the tv. The resolution isn't mind blowing but it's definitely worth the price. The only con is the remote is cheaply constructed, but again worth it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good picture, the sound isn't actually bad without a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd honestly say it's up there with the bigger brands. Really good picture, the sound isn't actually bad without a sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Lexii

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck, but like others have warned I had to get a sound bar to get to where I liked the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: other than that great
customer_reviews.text: The audio or speaker system rattles a little at certain volumes and pitch have not tried to adjust equalizer yet .other than that great tv
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Had it for two years then the back light went out cost more than it s worth to fix had to junk it

customer_reviews.title: tv
customer_reviews.text: the tv is nice the pic is great but the volume is very low i tried adjusting the bass etc to no avail
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year just to be sure to exceed manufacturers warranty don't waste your money or go ahead and buy 2 because you'll need to replace it soon enough

customer_reviews.title: great picture. all around great tv
customer_reviews.text: Item purchased for a "kiosk" for a church missions board. item exactly as described. great picture. all around great tv.

customer_reviews.title: Good tv, unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids room, works like a charm...

customer_reviews.title: For the money A+++
customer_reviews.text: I just retired my 25'' sanyo tube tv after 20 years and this is my first flat screen so I'm not an expert but I like what I see so far. Took me about 10 minutes to hook up. So far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Scam don't buy

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: It is a great T.V. for the price. I did extensive research and settled on this one. The only issue I have is the settings for the picture are a little to standardized, but they are easily fixed with a little internet research. Overall great value.
customer_reviews.author: Chess W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture, not much volume on the sound system, hooked it to my stereo.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I never take the time to write bad reviews - but this broke within 24 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise.
customer_reviews.text: The television has wonderful color. You can customize the sound to your liking. This television is extremely user friendly. Took less then 15 minutes to sit down to watch t.v from the time taking it out of the package and hooking it up to the cable box. That was a nice surprise. The only negative thing I have found, is the chrome cast adapter, does not fit in the T.V. Its too long.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Fullmer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful LED HDTV.. Great picture quality and sound. I have had it over a year and it is still working great. Can't beat the quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Jan 25 2016. Screen just went out. Got just under 2 years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the TV
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the TV. The box it came in said it should have shipped with a warranty card, quick start guide and instructions. I'm going to have to contact the manufacturer to see if I can download those items. No luck with my web search so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice TV, we were very pleasantly surprised especially for ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice TV, we were very pleasantly surprised especially for the price. We are not huge TV watchers but this done the trick. My only complaint would be that the remote is very sensitive so I have to hit power a few times to get it going.

customer_reviews.text: Upgraded an old 40" Samsung screen in my bedroom with this - holy crap am I happy. I use it for TV and as a PC monitor and since I'm legally blind it's a GIANTICAL monitor and I can actually see some stuff that I can't see on my 22" monitor at work or my 15" laptop monitor - so I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing purchase. Looking back on this purchase - - I would not do it again. The picture is fair... but - the biggest problem is the sound, which is a total joke. Sounds like a $3 transistor radio. So, I purchased the same brand (Sceptre) 'sound bar with sub' for an additional $70+ and that was also a total joke. Made no difference whatsoever. Got screwed on this one my friends. Don't you get shafted too......

customer_reviews.title: Good tv for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good tv for the money. Good picture sound is ok, but have a system so this is no problem.

customer_reviews.text: We have two of these. Great picture, size, and price. Buttons are easy to get to when you lose your remote.

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's great!
customer_reviews.text: It's what you would expect from a budget HDTV. There is obviously going to be a difference between this and a $3000 TV, but for the price, it's great!

customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying the tv very much and appreciate of the wonderful service.

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great the only thing I don't like it doesn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great the only thing I don't like it doesn't have control buttons on the television so you have to use the remote
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV for the price, I play Xbox, watch live and recorded TV such as football and action movies all with no glitches or artifacts on the screen. This TV has a nice remote and 3 kind of cramped HDMI ports on it. It comes with a stand as seen in the picture, the stand is easy to assemble and seems to balance the weight of the set well. When viewing the TiVo interfaces, the black backgrounds are very dark, the Xbox has very dark greys, and overall it is a very nice picture I use on the standard settings. The energy saving setting appears to be standard picture with less backlight.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fields

product_meta.title: Sceptre E505BV-FMQK 50-Inch 1080p LED HDTV
product_meta.description:
Raising the standards of style and performance, Scepter brings you the New E505BV-FMQK 50-inch LED HDTV. Full HD 1080P delivers a vivid combination of colors and clarity that stunningly resemble natural images. HDMI ports provide high definition images and impressive audio when you connect your Blu-Ray player, satellite or cable receiver, and top-of-the-line gaming console. MHL is included in the HDMI 2 port so you can conveniently connect your smartphone, tablet, or streaming stick to the TV. Insert a flash drive into the USB port to flip through your photos and tune into your music. Power range 100 - 240VAC, 50/60 Hz, 1.2A (Max.)

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 44.17" x 25.35" x 1.93", TV with stand: 44.17" x 27.95" x 12.72''
Inputs:VGA, Component, Composite, Cable/Antenna, Audio in
Accessories Included: Power Cord, Remote with Battery, User Guide, Base, Screws, Warranty Card
